page.title: 06Transport(Trade )
page.content: We went to Great Ponton Sevice Station to study the trade and attitudes of customers.The following results were obtained from a questioniare.Of the twelve people asked: 1)The longest journey was from Dover to York and the shortest was from Corby Glen to Great Ponton.Other destinations included Manchester, Worksop and Scunthorpe. 2)Eleven believed that the A1 was a safe road and only one did not.Some thought that the road should be widened. 3)Six used the road daily,three used it weekly,two used it monthly and one rarely used the A1. Judging by the volume of trafic Great Ponton Service Station has a high turnover.
